name: Wreckomancer Demo
description:
Here's a small demo of a game I've been working on for a little while. A lot of the game is still very much in development (expect bugs and untextured stuff) so expect more updates to come. Feedback would be much appreciated!

P.S. Once you have the ZIP installed, unzip it and extract both executables. Then, you can play Wrecknomancer. (Also don't take the Wrecknomancer executable out of the folder that screws the game up)
